properties.description:
[Detección ds intrusión-DS-T1012]
Alerta que identifica las acciones frente al Registro de Windows y de esta manera tener recopilada la información sobre el sistema, la configuración y el software instalado, evitando así el comportamiento anómalo del adversario.
properties.query:
// T1548 - Abuse Elevation Control Mechanism: Bypass User Account Control
// Reference: https://attack.mitre.org/techniques/T1548/002/
DeviceRegistryEvents
| where InitiatingProcessFileName in ("cmd.exe", "reg.exe", "Powershell.exe")
| where (InitiatingProcessCommandLine contains "add hkcu\\software\\classes\\mscfile\\shell\\open\\command" 
or InitiatingProcessCommandLine contains "delete hkcu\\software\\classes\\mscfile" 
or InitiatingProcessCommandLine contains "New-Item \"HKCU:\\software\\classes\\mscfile\\shell\\open\\command\"" 
or InitiatingProcessCommandLine contains "Set-ItemProperty \"HKCU:\\software\\classes\\mscfile\\shell\\open\\command\"" 
or InitiatingProcessCommandLine contains "Remove-Item \"HKCU:\\software\\classes\\mscfile\"" 
or InitiatingProcessCommandLine contains "add hkcu\\software\\classes\\ms-settings\\shell\\open\\command" 
or InitiatingProcessCommandLine contains "delete hkcu\\software\\classes\\ms-settings"
or InitiatingProcessCommandLine contains "New-Item \"HKCU:\\software\\classes\\ms-settings\\shell\\open\\command\""
or InitiatingProcessCommandLine contains "New-ItemProperty \"HKCU:\\software\\classes\\ms-settings\\shell\\open\\command\""
or InitiatingProcessCommandLine contains "Remove-Item \"HKCU:\\software\\classes\\ms-settings\""
or InitiatingProcessCommandLine contains "New-Item -Force -Path \"HKCU:\\Software\\Classes\\Folder\\shell\\open\\command\""
or InitiatingProcessCommandLine contains "New-ItemProperty -Force -Path \"HKCU:\\Software\\Classes\\Folder\\shell\\open\\command\""
or InitiatingProcessCommandLine contains "Remove-Item -Path \"HKCU:\\Software\\Classes\\Folder\""
or InitiatingProcessCommandLine contains "ADD HKLM\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Policies\\System"
or InitiatingProcessCommandLine contains "DELETE HKLM\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Policies\\System") 
or (ActionType in ("RegistryKeyCreated", "RegistryValueSet") 
and (PreviousRegistryKey contains "hkcu\\software\\classes\\mscfile\\shell\\open\\command" 
or PreviousRegistryKey contains "hkcu\\software\\classes\\ms-settings\\shell\\open\\command" 
or PreviousRegistryValueData contains "hkcu\\software\\classes\\mscfile\\shell\\open\\command" 
or PreviousRegistryValueName contains "hkcu\\software\\classes\\mscfile\\shell\\open\\command" 
or PreviousRegistryValueData contains "hkcu\\software\\classes\\ms-settings\\shell\\open\\command" 
or PreviousRegistryValueName contains "hkcu\\software\\classes\\ms-settings\\shell\\open\\command"
or PreviousRegistryKey contains "HKCU:\\software\\classes\\ms-settings\\shell\\open\\command"
or PreviousRegistryValueData contains "HKCU:\\software\\classes\\ms-settings\\shell\\open\\command"
or PreviousRegistryValueName contains "HKCU:\\software\\classes\\ms-settings\\shell\\open\\command"
or PreviousRegistryKey contains "HKCU:\\Software\\Classes\\Folder\\shell\\open\\command"
or PreviousRegistryValueData contains "HKCU:\\Software\\Classes\\Folder\\shell\\open\\command"
or PreviousRegistryValueName contains "HKCU:\\Software\\Classes\\Folder\\shell\\open\\command"
or PreviousRegistryKey contains "HKLM\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Policies\\System"
or PreviousRegistryValueData contains "HKLM\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Policies\\System"
or PreviousRegistryValueName contains "HKLM\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Policies\\System")) 
or (ActionType in ("RegistryValueDeleted", "RegistryKeyDeleted") 
and (PreviousRegistryKey contains "hkcu\\software\\classes\\mscfile" 
or PreviousRegistryKey contains "hkcu\\software\\classes\\ms-settings"
or PreviousRegistryValueName contains "hkcu\\software\\classes\\mscfile"
or PreviousRegistryValueData contains "hkcu\\software\\classes\\mscfile"
or PreviousRegistryValueName contains "hkcu\\software\\classes\\ms-settings"
or PreviousRegistryValueData contains "hkcu\\software\\classes\\ms-settings"
or PreviousRegistryKey contains "HKCU:\\software\\classes\\ms-settings"
or PreviousRegistryValueData contains "HKCU:\\software\\classes\\ms-settings"
or PreviousRegistryValueName contains "HKCU:\\software\\classes\\ms-settings"
or PreviousRegistryKey contains "HKCU:\\Software\\Classes\\Folder"
or PreviousRegistryValueData contains "HKCU:\\Software\\Classes\\Folder"
or PreviousRegistryValueName contains "HKCU:\\Software\\Classes\\Folder"
or PreviousRegistryKey contains "HKLM\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Policies\\System"
or PreviousRegistryValueData contains "HKLM\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Policies\\System"
or PreviousRegistryValueName contains "HKLM\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Policies\\System"))
| union (DeviceProcessEvents
| where FileName in ("cmd.exe", "reg.exe", "Powershell.exe")
| where (ProcessCommandLine contains "add hkcu\\software\\classes\\mscfile\\shell\\open\\command" 
or ProcessCommandLine contains "delete hkcu\\software\\classes\\mscfile" 
or ProcessCommandLine contains "New-Item \"HKCU:\\software\\classes\\mscfile\\shell\\open\\command\"" 
or ProcessCommandLine contains "Set-ItemProperty \"HKCU:\\software\\classes\\mscfile\\shell\\open\\command\"" 
or ProcessCommandLine contains "Remove-Item \"HKCU:\\software\\classes\\mscfile\"" 
or ProcessCommandLine contains "add hkcu\\software\\classes\\ms-settings\\shell\\open\\command" 
or ProcessCommandLine contains "delete hkcu\\software\\classes\\ms-settings"
or ProcessCommandLine contains "New-Item \"HKCU:\\software\\classes\\ms-settings\\shell\\open\\command\""
or ProcessCommandLine contains "New-ItemProperty \"HKCU:\\software\\classes\\ms-settings\\shell\\open\\command\""
or ProcessCommandLine contains "Remove-Item \"HKCU:\\software\\classes\\ms-settings\""
or ProcessCommandLine contains "New-Item -Force -Path \"HKCU:\\Software\\Classes\\Folder\\shell\\open\\command\""
or ProcessCommandLine contains "New-ItemProperty -Force -Path \"HKCU:\\Software\\Classes\\Folder\\shell\\open\\command\""
or ProcessCommandLine contains "Remove-Item -Path \"HKCU:\\Software\\Classes\\Folder\""
or ProcessCommandLine contains "ADD HKLM\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Policies\\System"
or ProcessCommandLine contains "DELETE HKLM\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Policies\\System")
)
| union (SecurityEvent
| where Process in ("cmd.exe", "reg.exe", "Powershell.exe")
| where (CommandLine contains "add hkcu\\software\\classes\\mscfile\\shell\\open\\command" 
or CommandLine contains "delete hkcu\\software\\classes\\mscfile" 
or CommandLine contains "New-Item \"HKCU:\\software\\classes\\mscfile\\shell\\open\\command\"" 
or CommandLine contains "Set-ItemProperty \"HKCU:\\software\\classes\\mscfile\\shell\\open\\command\"" 
or CommandLine contains "Remove-Item \"HKCU:\\software\\classes\\mscfile\"" 
or CommandLine contains "add hkcu\\software\\classes\\ms-settings\\shell\\open\\command" 
or CommandLine contains "delete hkcu\\software\\classes\\ms-settings"
or CommandLine contains "New-Item \"HKCU:\\software\\classes\\ms-settings\\shell\\open\\command\""
or CommandLine contains "New-ItemProperty \"HKCU:\\software\\classes\\ms-settings\\shell\\open\\command\""
or CommandLine contains "Remove-Item \"HKCU:\\software\\classes\\ms-settings\""
or CommandLine contains "New-Item -Force -Path \"HKCU:\\Software\\Classes\\Folder\\shell\\open\\command\""
or CommandLine contains "New-ItemProperty -Force -Path \"HKCU:\\Software\\Classes\\Folder\\shell\\open\\command\""
or CommandLine contains "Remove-Item -Path \"HKCU:\\Software\\Classes\\Folder\""
or CommandLine contains "ADD HKLM\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Policies\\System"
or CommandLine contains "DELETE HKLM\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Policies\\System")
)
| summarize entries = makelist(pack_all()) by InitiatingProcessCommandLine = ProcessCommandLine, AccountDomain = DeviceName, AccountName = InitiatingProcessAccountName
